queryData.query: SELECT (select count(ID) from TransactionsHistory) as totCount, (select round(avg(amount), 2) from TransactionsHistory) as totAmount, (select count(ID) from TransactionsHistory where isSCAApplied =1) as scaCount, (select round(avg(amount), 2) from TransactionsHistory where isSCAApplied =1) as scaAmount, (select count(ID) from TransactionsHistory where isSCAApplied =0) as exemptCount, (select round(avg(amount), 2) from TransactionsHistory where isSCAApplied =0) as exemptAmount FROM openbank_tra_db.TransactionsHistory limit 1 #
